persons.name: persons
persons.summary: The persons table includes data on people within the Sirius system. It contains both LPA, Guardianship and Supervision data, as well as data relating to persons who are informed parties.

addresses.name: addresses
addresses.summary: Contains details of addresses associated with persons in the database

cases.name: cases
cases.summary: Contains details of LPA, Supervision and Guardianship cases

documents.name: documents
documents.summary: Contains details of documents associated with persons in the database

finance_invoice.name: finance_invoice
finance_invoice.summary: Contains details of finance invoices associated with deputies in the database

finance_order.name: finance_order
finance_order.summary: Contains details of order fnance information for deputies

finance_person.name: finance_person
finance_person.summary: Contains details of deputies who pay invoices in the database

finance_remission_exemption.name: finance_remission_exemption
finance_remission_exemption.summary: Contains details of deputies who have fee reductions or exemptions in the database

investigation.name: investigation
investigation.summary: Contains details of deputies who have investigations in the database

annual_report_logs.name: annual_report_logs
annual_report_logs.summary: Contains details of annual reports associated with deputies

annual_report_lodging_details.name: annual_report_lodging_details
annual_report_lodging_details.summary: Contains details of annual reports lodging associated with deputies

annual_report_type_assignments.name: annual_report_type_assignments
annual_report_type_assignments.summary: Contains details of annual reports types associated with deputies

assignees.name: assignees
assignees.summary: Contains details of teams and users assigned to cases

supervision_level_log.name: supervision_level_log
supervision_level_log.summary: The historic supervision level log for deputies

supervision_notes.name: supervision_notes
supervision_notes.summary: Notes relating to clients on deputyships
